cells.data:
ACF 

Customise WordPress with powerful, professional and intuitive fields
https://www.advancedcustomfields.com/my-account/

All-in-One WP Migration 

All-in-One WP Migration is the only tool that you will ever need to migrate a WordPress site.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/all-in-one-wp-migration/

Yoast & ACF

Add Yoast SEO Validation to your ACF Fields.
https://github.com/dachcom-digital/acf-yoast-seo-validation

Template Debugger

Intended for Developers: This template debugger helps you identify what template files are being used on the page you're viewing.
 https://wordpress.org/plugins/quick-edit-template-link/

wp-manual-image-crop

Plugin allows you to manually crop all the image sizes registered in your WordPress theme (in particular featured image).
https://github.com/tomaszsita/wp-manual-image-crop

CPT-onomies 

Use your custom post types as taxonomies. Create powerful relationships between your posts and, therefore, powerful content.
https://github.com/bamadesigner/cpt-onomies

Contact Form 7 

Just another contact form plugin. Simple but flexible.
 https://wordpress.org/plugins/contact-form-7/

Fluid Video Embeds

Make your "auto embedded" YouTube and Vimeo videos full width (100%) while maintaining their original aspect ratio
https://wordpress.org/plugins/fluid-video-embeds/

Yoast SEO

Improve your WordPress SEO: Write better content and have a fully optimised WordPress site using Yoast SEO plugin.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-seo/

W3 Total Cache

Easy Web Performance Optimization (WPO) using caching: browser, page, object, database, minify and content delivery network support.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/w3-total-cache/

Post Types Order

Post Order and custom Post Type Objects (posts, any custom post types) using a Drag and Drop Sortable JavaScript AJAX interface
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/post-types-order/

WP Help

Site operators can create detailed, hierarchical documentation for the site's authors, editors, and contributors, viewable in the WordPress admin
https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-help/

Simple Share Buttons Adder

A simple plugin that enables you to add share buttons to all of your posts and/or pages.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/simple-share-buttons-adder/

BU Section Editing

Advanced content editing workflow in WordPress through the use of section editing groups and permissions.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/bu-section-editing/

BU Navigation

Robust tools for managing hierarchical page content in WordPress. Ideal for blogs with large page counts.
https://wordpress.org/plugins/bu-navigation/

TinyMCE Advanced

Enables the advanced features of TinyMCE, the WordPress WYSIWYG editor.
https://wordpress.org/plugins/tinymce-advanced/

Pods - Custom Content Types and Fields

Pods is a framework for creating, managing, and deploying customized content types and fields.
https://en-gb.wordpress.org/plugins/pods/
https://www.elegantthemes.com/blog/tips-tricks/using-pods-and-divi-to-easily-transform-wordpress-into-a-highly-customizable-content-management-system
